name: @mentingo/performance-tests
description: K6 performance testing suite for Mentingo API - simulating concurrent users

scripts.test:load: set -a && source .env && set +a && k6 run src/scenarios/load-test.js
scripts.test:stress: set -a && source .env && set +a && k6 run src/scenarios/stress-test.js
scripts.test:spike: set -a && source .env && set +a && k6 run src/scenarios/spike-test.js
scripts.test:soak: set -a && source .env && set +a && k6 run src/scenarios/soak-test.js
scripts.test:load:dashboard: set -a && source .env && set +a && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_PERIOD=1s k6 run src/scenarios/load-test.js
scripts.test:mixed: set -a && source .env && set +a && k6 run src/tests/mixed-workload.test.js
scripts.test:load:cloud: set -a && source .env && set +a && k6 cloud --env ENVIRONMENT=$ENVIRONMENT --env API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --env TEST_USER_EMAIL=$TEST_USER_EMAIL --env TEST_USER_PASSWORD=$TEST_USER_PASSWORD --env TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL=$TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL --env TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD=$TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD --env TEST_CREATOR_EMAIL=$TEST_CREATOR_EMAIL --env TEST_CREATOR_PASSWORD=$TEST_CREATOR_PASSWORD --env SEEDED_USER_PASSWORD=$SEEDED_USER_PASSWORD --env SEEDED_STUDENT_COUNT=$SEEDED_STUDENT_COUNT --env SEEDED_ADMIN_COUNT=$SEEDED_ADMIN_COUNT --env SEEDED_CREATOR_COUNT=$SEEDED_CREATOR_COUNT src/scenarios/load-test.js
